title: Filter
description: The purifier is built around a Xiaomi Smartmi replacement filter. Please search for "Smartmi SMARTMI AIR PURIFIER Activated Carbon Filter, HEPA-H13" and make sure the filter found has the correct product dimensions of 20 x 20 x 29.3 cm. ![Xiaomi Filter](https://github.com/the-butcher/PRINTABLE_PURIFIER/blob/master/unit_purifier/unit_filter/xiaomi_filter.jpg?raw=true)
